title: Spanish lemon chicken
ingredients: ['1.5kg large chicken thighs', 'sea salt and ground black pepper', '125g plain flour', '6 tablespoons good olive oil', '1 large onion, chopped', '4 cloves garlic, roughly crushed', '75g chorizo, chopped', '1 teaspoon ras el hanout spice mix', '300g frozen broad beans', '4 to 6 tablespoons chopped preserved lemon', '1 chicken stock cube', '100ml brandy', '1 handful flat leaf parsley to garnish']
